title: Learn how Music Fans Discover your Music.
body: A guide to the three key pathways for getting discovered on BRIDG3 — plus a few steps you can take now to grow your audience and what makes us different.
title2: It changes the way of what true ownership means.

reasonsList.title: Build your audience at any stage
reasonsList.description: A guide to the three key pathways for getting discovered on BRIDG3 — plus a few steps you can take now to grow you audience and what makes us different.

reasonsList.title: Inspire fans with your creativity
reasonsList.description: With our profile tools, you can change your bio and photos whenever inspiration strikes. Let fans know the real you through music.

reasonsList.title: Learn from your fans
reasonsList.description: Find out how your songs are performing, how you are being discovered, and where your audience is through our Artists Dashboard.

reasonsList.title: Artist Friendly. User. Friendly.
reasonsList.description: A Familiar DSP Interface With Revolutionizing Web 3.0 Technology. Show Your Potential Now.

reasonsList.title: End 2 End Artist Suite.
reasonsList.description: Upload and sell their music as NFTs. Our artist suite allows users to launch their collections, songs, playlists, you name it.

reasonsList.title: Multi-Wallet Compatibility
reasonsList.description: We support multiple wallets so users can use the tools tehy are familiar with.

contactBody: Please feel free to contact us at any time using one of our social media links below
